mapper.sql: SPO_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, SPO_COUNTS, SPO_PRICE, REGISTER_DATE, SPO_DATE, IPO_DATE, RATION_SATE,RATION_TYPE,NOT_RATION_COUNTS, SUCCESS_RATION_COUNTS,MIN_RATION_COUNTS,MIN_RATION_PROPORTION,REBATE,BE_LISTED,PRE_PLACEMENT,POSITIONS_PRICE
